name: Versatile Asian Noodle Bowl
description: A bowl of nutrient rich goodness perfect anytime of the year.

ingredients.name: cooked rice vermicelli, whole-grain udon, or chow mein noodles

preparation: Place noodles, mixed greens, and tofu in a soup bowl.
In a large measuring cup, combine hot Broth with dip mix or seasoning, if desired. Pour over noodles, add your favourite toppings, and drizzle with sauce.
tips: Swap tofu for cooked meats, such as chicken, pork, shrimp, or fish.   Add toppings, such as cilantro, basil, bean sprouts, or sliced jalapeños.   To give it a little tang, squeeze in some lemon juice, ponzu sauce (citrus soy sauce), or sriracha sauce.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
